name: Sales & Commission PRO
tag_list: sales, commission, ordering, mileage, expenses, accounting, inventory-management
overview:
Sales & Commission PRO is an iPhone app used for sales force automation as a complete mobile commerce solution. It can be used to take orders, manage customers and inventory and manage expenses and mileage. This app is affordable and can be customized to meet any company needs. At only $0.99 per month, this solution will pay for itself during the next tax season when each salesperson does their taxes. They can simply e-mail their accountant their mileage and expenses right from the the phone. They can also report out their yearly sales figures along with discounts, shipping charges, sales taxes collected and inventory on hand and send that to their accountant. Sales & Commission PRO will eliminate customer wait times, increase customer engagement and build brand loyalty for any organization.

For their company, sales people can report weekly & monthly sales for motivational meetings. Itâ€™s ideal for direct selling organizations, realtors, auto sales, industrial supplies & equipment, vending machines or any other area where you need sales conducted in the field. Orders can be e-mailed directly from the field the parent company in an instant. Customer interactions can be selling opportunities for every sales person. Armed with the products and inventory on hand each sales person can hit the road and collect orders to meet their customersâ€™ needs.

You see many organizations (Chipotle, Starbucks) announcing the creation of their own mobile ordering apps. Sales & Commission PRO can easily be re-configured for any business to distribute to their current or NEW customers for FREE to enhance their order processes. Whether you run a restaurant, an industrial supply company or simply want to expand your customer base through a new mobile application configured specifically for your organization, Sales & Commission PRO offers the foundation that can make this process quick and affordable. This app can be an ordering app branded with the company logo and using the company products and can be made free to download from the iTunes store.

Consumers of today and tomorrow demand quality mobile commerce solutions that make their lives easier. Using mobile solutions that not only allow you to get customer information, but also collect payments for goods and services and create a memorable customer experience.

Mobile apps are a part of a complete suite of solutions to enhance the guest experience and engage customers
